message: but inside branches, there's a hierarchy like feature_branches/[username]/[feature branch name]
it would be nice if I could make git-svn play nicely with the feature branches as they are
is it possible to exclude remote branches from being pulled in using git(-svn)?
I'm using git-svn to interact with our SVN repo, and we've got a mostly standard SVN setup (branches, tags, trunk)
but I'm perfectly fine just blacklisting/excluding the "feature_branches" branch too
